name: Snapsquatch
description:
The lost land of the bigfoots has been discovered! Are you a good enough photographer to prove that your 4 years in photography school was worth the money and make it big in the Big Footography world?

Travel on rails through the land of the bigfoots and snap photographs of all the wonderous creatures.  Made in 48 hours during the 2021 Central Florida GGJ
Art and assets made using Oculus Quill

Note: scoring broken and animations missing in current GGJ build
